g.text: DFSP2 sends a Fulfil Abort Transfer request
Persist request payload with messageId in cache
[n times, n = number of individual transfers]
Produce fulfil message with action bulk-abort for each individual transfer
[n times, n = number of individual transfers]
[n times, n = number of individual transfers]
[n times, n = number of individual transfers]
